SUB = sb.Substrate()
M_LYR = sb.Layer('m_bott', 0.0001, sb.COPPER, sb.AIR)
M_LYR.set_rules(0.000508, 0.01, 0.000508)
D_LYR = sb.Layer('core', 0.0008, sb.COPPER, sb.D5880)
D_LYR.set_rules(0.000508, 0.01, 0.000508)
SUB.add_layer(M_LYR)
SUB.add_layer(D_LYR)
SUB.add_layer(M_LYR)
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    SUB.dump('tests')
SUB.dump('tests/tech.yml')
SUB.load('tests/tech.yml')
assert SUB.get_index_of('m_bott') == 0
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    SUB.get_index_of('foo')
